abstract.original_text: Immunofluorescence images (a) and quantification of neuronal proportions (b) showing ablation of TRPV1 + and CGRP + neurons after systemic DT or PBS injection in Trpv1-Dtr mice in T1-T9 dorsal root ganglia (DRG) or nodose/jugular/petrosal vagal ganglia (VG). TRPV1 + , CGRP + or NF-200 + neurons were quantified out of total β-III tubulin + neurons over multiple imaging fields for the DRG or VG. Each dot represents the proportion (%) of total neurons in a field that are positive for each marker. Data was analyzed from PBS-injected Trpv1-Dtr mice (n=3) or DTinjected Trpv1-Dtr mice (n=3). Data are from one experiment with multiple biological replicates for a and b. Statistical analysis for p-values by two-tailed unpaired t-tests. Error bars indicate mean±s.e.m.

sentences.segment_text: Immunofluorescence images ( a ) and quantification of neuronal proportions ( b ) showing ablation of TRPV1 + and CGRP + neurons after systemic DT or PBS injection in Trpv1-Dtr mice in T1-T9 dorsal root ganglia ( DRG ) or nodose/jugular/petrosal vagal ganglia ( VG ) .
TRPV1 + , CGRP + or NF-200 + neurons were quantified out of total β-III tubulin + neurons over multiple imaging fields for the DRG or VG .
Each dot represents the proportion ( % ) of total neurons in a field that are positive for each marker .
Data was analyzed from PBS-injected Trpv1-Dtr mice ( n = 3 ) or DTinjected Trpv1-Dtr mice ( n = 3 ) .
Data are from one experiment with multiple biological replicates for a and b. Statistical analysis for p-values by two-tailed unpaired t-tests .
Error bars indicate mean ± s.e.m.

abstract.original_text: Figure 2. Diptheria Toxin (DT) treatment of Trpv1-Dtr mice ablates CGRP + nerve fibers adjacent to airways. Representative images of lung sections from systemic PBS-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice (top left, n=3) or DT-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice (top right, n=3)

sentences.segment_text: Figure 2 .
Diptheria Toxin ( DT ) treatment of Trpv1-Dtr mice ablates CGRP + nerve fibers adjacent to airways .
Representative images of lung sections from systemic PBS-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice ( top left , n = 3 ) or DT-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice ( top right , n = 3 )

abstract.original_text: immunostained for CGRP (red) and DAPI (blue). Bottom Left: Quantification of CGRP + nerves around airways were performed as follows: i) An area of 100 µm width was circumscribed around each airway and measured using Adobe Photoshop. ii) The area immuno-positive for CGRP (red) was quantified within the total airway-adjacent area (%) was calculated. Bottom Right: Each dot represents the average CGRP reactivity/airway from a single mouse, averaged across at least 7 airways/mouse. Data are from one experiment, PBS-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice (n=3) and DT-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice (n=3). Statistical analysis for p-value by two-tailed unpaired t-test. Error bars indicate mean± s.e.m. Scale bars, 100 µm. Supplementary Figure 3. TRPV1 + neuron ablation leads to reduced noxious heat sensitivity. (a) Vehicle-treated (n=5) or RTX-treated mice (n=5) were assayed in the hot plate test (52 °C) for latency to hindpaw lifting/licking/flinching. (b) Vehicle-treated (n=5) or RTX-treated mice (n=5) were assayed in the tail-flick assay (52°C water bath) for latency to tail flick. (c) PBS-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice (n=10) or DT-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice (n=10) were tested in the hot plate test. (d) PBS-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice (n=7) or DT-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice (n=7) were tested in the tail-flick assay (52°C water bath) for latency to tail flick. Data shown in a-d are from two independent experiments. Statistical analyses for pvalues in a-d by two-tailed unpaired t-tests. Error bars indicate mean± s.e.m. Supplementary Figure 4. Depletion of TRPV1 + neurons in DRG and VG after resiniferatoxin (RTX) injection. (a) Immunofluorescence staining of TRPV1, CGRP, or NF-200 (All green) in DRG (T1-T9) and vagal ganglia (VG) sections. Ablation of TRPV1 + and CGRP + neurons, but not NF-200 + neurons, occurs after resiniferatoxin (RTX) treatment. (b) Quantification of proportion of TRPV1 + , CGRP + , and NF-200 + neurons out of total neurons in DRG (T1-T9) or VG. Each dot represents the proportion (%) of total β-III tubulin+ neurons in a field that are positive for each marker out of total neurons. Data is from one experiment: vehicle-treated mice (n=3) and RTX-treated mice (n=3). Statistical analysis for p-values by two-tailed unpaired t-tests. Error bars indicate mean± s.e.m. Supplementary Figure 7. Role of TRPV1 + neurons in host defense against S. pneumoniae, K. pneumoniae, and P. aeruginosa lung infections. (a) Left, survival curves of RTX-treated mice (n=8) and vehicle-treated mice (n=8) after infection with Streptococcus pneumoniae strain WU-2 (5 x 10 6 CFU/mouse), analyzed by log-rank test (p=0.13). Right, core body temperature measurements in RTX-treated (n=5) and vehicle-treated mice (n=5), analyzed by two-way RM ANOVA with Bonferroni post-tests (ns, not significant, p>0.05). (b) Left, survival curves of RTX-treated (n=5) and vehicle-treated mice (n=5) after infection with Klebsiella pneumoniae (10 4 CFU/mouse), log-rank test (p>0.99). Right, core body temperature measurements in RTX-treated (n=5) and Vehicle-treated (n=4) mice, two-way RM ANOVA with Bonferroni post-tests (ns, p>0.05). (c) Left, survival curves of RTX-treated (n=5) and vehicletreated (n=5) mice after infection with Pseudomonas aeruginosa strain PA01V (7 x 10 6 CFU/ mouse), log-rank test (p=0.22). Right, core body temperature measurements in RTX-treated (n=3) and vehicle-treated (n=4) mice, analyzed by two-way RM ANOVA with Bonferroni posttests (ns, p>0.05). Data shown in a are from two independent experiments, and in b and c from one experiment. Error bars throughout figure indicate mean±s.e.m.

sentences.segment_text: immunostained for CGRP ( red ) and DAPI ( blue ) .
Bottom Left : Quantification of CGRP + nerves around airways were performed as follows : i ) An area of 100 µm width was circumscribed around each airway and measured using Adobe Photoshop .
ii ) The area immuno-positive for CGRP ( red ) was quantified within the total airway-adjacent area ( % ) was calculated .
Bottom Right : Each dot represents the average CGRP reactivity/airway from a single mouse ,
averaged across at least 7 airways/mouse .
Data are from one experiment ,
PBS-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice ( n = 3 ) and DT-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice ( n = 3 ) .
Statistical analysis for p-value by two-tailed unpaired t-test .
Error bars indicate mean ± s.e.m. Scale bars , 100 µm .
Supplementary Figure 3 .
TRPV1 + neuron ablation leads to reduced noxious heat sensitivity .
( a ) Vehicle-treated ( n = 5 ) or RTX-treated mice ( n = 5 ) were assayed in the hot plate test ( 52 °C ) for latency to hindpaw lifting/licking/flinching .
( b ) Vehicle-treated ( n = 5 ) or RTX-treated mice ( n = 5 ) were assayed in the tail-flick assay ( 52 °C water bath ) for latency to tail flick .
( c ) PBS-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice ( n = 10 ) or DT-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice ( n = 10 ) were tested in the hot plate test .
( d ) PBS-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice ( n = 7 ) or DT-treated Trpv1-Dtr mice ( n = 7 ) were tested in the tail-flick assay ( 52 °C water bath ) for latency to tail flick .
Data shown in a-d are from two independent experiments .
Statistical analyses for pvalues in a-d by two-tailed unpaired t-tests .
Error bars indicate mean ± s.e.m. Supplementary Figure 4 .
Depletion of TRPV1 + neurons in DRG and VG after resiniferatoxin ( RTX ) injection .
( a ) Immunofluorescence staining of TRPV1 ,
CGRP , or NF-200 ( All green ) in DRG ( T1-T9 ) and vagal ganglia ( VG ) sections .
Ablation of TRPV1 + and CGRP + neurons ,
but not NF-200 + neurons ,
occurs after resiniferatoxin ( RTX ) treatment .
( b ) Quantification of proportion of TRPV1 + ,
CGRP + , and NF-200 + neurons out of total neurons in DRG ( T1-T9 ) or VG .
Each dot represents the proportion ( % ) of total β-III tubulin + neurons in a field that are positive for each marker out of total neurons .
Data is from one experiment : vehicle-treated mice ( n = 3 ) and RTX-treated mice ( n = 3 ) .
Statistical analysis for p-values by two-tailed unpaired t-tests .
Error bars indicate mean ± s.e.m. Supplementary Figure 7 .
Role of TRPV1 + neurons in host defense against S. pneumoniae ,
K. pneumoniae , and P. aeruginosa lung infections .
( a ) Left , survival curves of RTX-treated mice ( n = 8 ) and vehicle-treated mice ( n = 8 ) after infection with Streptococcus pneumoniae strain WU-2 ( 5 x 10 6 CFU/mouse ) ,
analyzed by log-rank test ( p = 0.13 ) .
Right , core body temperature measurements in RTX-treated ( n = 5 ) and vehicle-treated mice ( n = 5 ) ,
analyzed by two-way RM ANOVA with Bonferroni post-tests ( ns , not significant , p > 0.05 ) .
( b ) Left , survival curves of RTX-treated ( n = 5 ) and vehicle-treated mice ( n = 5 ) after infection with Klebsiella pneumoniae ( 10 4 CFU/mouse ) ,
log-rank test ( p > 0.99 ) .
Right , core body temperature measurements in RTX-treated ( n = 5 ) and Vehicle-treated ( n = 4 ) mice ,
two-way RM ANOVA with Bonferroni post-tests ( ns , p > 0.05 ) .
( c ) Left , survival curves of RTX-treated ( n = 5 ) and vehicletreated ( n = 5 ) mice after infection with Pseudomonas aeruginosa strain PA01V ( 7 x 10 6 CFU / mouse ) ,
log-rank test ( p = 0.22 ) .
Right , core body temperature measurements in RTX-treated ( n = 3 ) and vehicle-treated ( n = 4 ) mice ,
analyzed by two-way RM ANOVA with Bonferroni posttests ( ns , p > 0.05 ) .
Data shown in a are from two independent experiments ,
and in b and c from one experiment .
Error bars throughout figure indicate mean ± s.e.m.
